title: Instructional Design Workshop for Analyzing University Learning Media Usage Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory statistical analysis and experience with e-learning tools
context.additional_context: Research-focused course analyzing digital media utilization patterns in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can classify learner media usage data using latent class analysis (LCA) techniques.
Learners can explain differences in media utilization strategies between traditional and non-traditional learner types.
Learners can propose context-specific personalized instructional designs based on analytical results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
